name: Taiga Escape
description:
Defeat enemies with only your sword and skills to make points and try to escape from Taiga Forest on this infinite runner style game with hack ´n slash elements.

Your objective is to reach the maximum score that you can on this adventure game with random generated levels each time you play.

Collect coins to buy upgrades and try to make more points to reach a new highscore.

How much time are you capable to survive?

Controls:

Jump - Spacebar

Attack - Left Mouse Button
